code: import Swal from'sweetalert2';import withReactContent from'sweetalert2-react-content';export function mostrar_alerta(mensaje,icono){let foco=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'';onfocus(foco);const MySwal=withReactContent(Swal);MySwal.fire({title:mensaje,icon:icono});}function onfocus(foco){if(foco!==''){document.getElementById(foco).focus();}}
